Greetings everyone!

MissionEd, proudly presents Apti-Holic, a mind-challenging All India Aptitude Test. Let’s uncover your strengths, along with your ability to succeed in specific situations.

Guidelines:

The event will be in the form of a quiz which consists of multiple-choice questions
You can start the test at any time on 7th August 2021
You will be given 25 minutes to attempt and mark your answers.
Once you start the exam you cannot start over

Perks:

Free of cost registration with certificates and amazing prizes
Prize money and incentives worth INR 20000 to be given 

So what are you waiting for? Hurry up and 𝐫𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐚𝐭 D2C: https://dare2compete.com/o/gfuXzWo?refId=21071013 

Don’t forget to sign up on the MissionEd Forum platform to receive notifications regarding the event:https://missioned-forum.web.app/
